Header.title: We are a Binyod
Header.paragraph: Binyod provides expert Information Technology solutions in the Houston, TX area. Binyod’s experts are Cisco certified engineers with a focus on customer service. We can develop IT security solutions, cloud computing solutions, VOIP services, content filtering and provide consultation to develop unique solutions appropriate for your business needs.

About.paragraph: Information Technology is integral to every business, its integration, management and upkeep can be time and resource consuming for businesses across industries. Managing technology can be a full time responsibility, shifting attention and resources from core business activities. Partnering with Binyod to manage and implement IT saves you and your business the stress and hassle, so you can focus on your business.

Services.name: Managed IT Services
Services.text: Let Binyod focus on your IT needs, so you can focus on your core business.

Services.name: Cloud Computing
Services.text: Let us secure your organization’s workload through a secure cloud environment.

Services.name: Network Security
Services.text: Protect your network through firewalls and content filtering, IDS/IPS systemsю

Services.name: Cisco Technologies
Services.text: Our staff is CISCO certified and ready to help you configure and maintain routers & switches.

Services.name: Virtualization Services
Services.text: Set up your virtual server to optimize your business.

Services.name: On-site & Cloud VoIP
Services.text: Streamline your business’ phone systems through VoIP service.

Services.name: Data Backup & Recovery
Services.text: Data is vital to business. We Recover, restore, and back-up vital business data.

Services.name: IT Consulting & Hosting
Services.text: BinYod can help implement new technology or update your current system.
